archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.8a: a) built using a defined and reusable process (also referred to as a security pattern) detailing the necessary steps and settings to meet secure configuration requirements
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
